page.title: 06THE MACDONALD SISTERS
page.content: The 5 daughters of the Rev. George Macdonald made certain influence on the village of{Wilden.Louisa}married {Alfred Baldwin}and their son became {Prime Minister and the first Earl {Baldwin of Bewdley.Georgina}married {Edward Byrne-Jones,the Pre-Raphaelite painter,who provided the church of Wilden with it's rare collection of stained glass windows-now priceless. {Alice}married{John Lockwood Kipling and their son{Rudyard}is remembered as the most famous poet and writer of the British Empire and of course{Jungle {Book. {Agnes}married{Edward Poynter,}later president of the Royal Academy. Lastly,{Edith}remained unmarried spending much of her time producing a heavily embroidered altar frontal which has been displayed in Paris and the Victoria and Albert Museum.
